website_summaries.verdict: There's a lot to love about this case. It's softly padded with a strong frame, roomy enough for your tripod, and can be carried on its own or clipped to another bag.
pros: Carry over shoulder or clip directly to your pack
Polyethylene frame gives strength and protection
Color is perfect to blend in while hunting or birding
cons: The strap can pivot a bit when you're carrying the bag over your shoulder, working the zipper open and allowing a bit of dirt inside

customer_reviews.title: Fits a Swarovski AT80 spotting scope easily
customer_reviews.text: If you have an older spotting scope, don't despair. I have an old Swarovski AT80 Habicht spotting scope with long gray body and angled viewfinder. My scope is 4 inches wide at the widest point and 18 inches long at the maximum. I was hesitant to buy this ALPS sleeve because the specs said interior dimension was only 16 inches long. I thought it might fit because the interior diameter is 5 inches and the body is soft and flexible. My guess was correct. This fits by Swarovski AT80 comfortably and has much more padding than the original sleeve. This is a well made sleeve with excellent padding, straps, buckles, and closure. See photos.
customer_reviews.author: Sidd

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag
customer_reviews.text: I got this scope bag because of the good reviews and the info it would fit the Vortex Viper HD 20-60 85mm spotter. ...It doesn’t fit very well. It fits but the scope is a little too long. There is a gap when closing the bag (see pictures). Don’t think about putting the scope in with the neoprene cover on...too tight! The bag is from good quality and nice materials, worth the money and all stars. I will not return it as I like it, but I will give it to my wife who is skilled with her sewing machines and get it modified for better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Technik-Guru

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size & Fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and fit for my Bushnell Spacemaster 15-45x60MM spotting scope and tripod. The scope sleeve is very well made with nice padding. The sleeve securely accommodates my scope in its Bushnell padded case bag. No problem with sleeve top, hinge strap and buckle. The sleeve has a nice outside pocket that fits my Spacemaster tripod and comes with useful carrying strap. Great item to use when you don't need to deal with a hard case.
customer_reviews.author: Good39

customer_reviews.title: Soft & Reducible Carrier.
customer_reviews.text: Soft, soft carrying case to tote your spotting scope & tripod about. Plenty of room to add in a zip lock of Kim Wipes, optics cleaning brush, squirt bottle of cleaner, etc. Don't know if it was necessary but - I shot a coat of Scotch Guard on for added water protection. Sling is a nice touch. Have had it for a year & experienced no problems.
customer_reviews.author: RandyRoddey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: As with all other ALPS products that I’ve purchased this case is high quality and suits every need. Well made and is sized perfect. I have a Swarovski 80mm with the stay on case and it all fits perfectly into this case.
customer_reviews.author: james imperial

customer_reviews.title: Makes for a great carry case for the Henry Survival Rifle
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with another idea in mind. Makes for a great carry case for the Henry Survival Rifle. Fits perfectly and with the side pouch can carry extra ammo, mags and even a scope.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect case for my B&L Balscope Zoom 60 (17"x3.5") .. well padded all around .. and secure. Tripod straps hold my MZ2000 tripod!
customer_reviews.author: amazonfan31

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Thick padding fits large spotting scopes and tripod.. little heavy but good protection
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Great! Fits Zeiss 20x60 Angled Scope Well
customer_reviews.text: Very nice...fits my Zeiss 20x60 angled eyepiece scope quite well. It's much better than the Zeiss brand scope sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: ZenBirder

customer_reviews.title: Great Scope Cover
customer_reviews.text: Fits our scope to a "T" Very nice quality, easy to carry. Nicely done.
customer_reviews.author: Mother Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had a handle on the side. My NF spotting scope fits perfect in it
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Z. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a tight fit for my Nikon 20-60x82mm spotting scope, but it closes without damaging it. I just worry about the eyepiece being vulnerable. Nice case, though.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Talk about a great case at the right price. We use it for a scope.
customer_reviews.author: DMZ123

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels good
customer_reviews.text: I feel that this is a great buy for under $30. First of all the dimensions that are shown here on amazon (16 x 5 in.) are for the inside sleeve not the exterior. I have not used it in the field but I let my kids mess around with it and it did not break yet. The tripod pouch is large and and accommodates my large tripod.
customer_reviews.author: Drschlecht

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice soft case. Fits my older Bushnell Sentry II with extra room. Seems to be a good case.
customer_reviews.author: Tom W

customer_reviews.title: Good spotting scope sleeve
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for my vortex spotting scope. Keeps everything protected and easy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Nate B.

customer_reviews.title: Fits my spotting scope perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Offers great protection for my spotting scope with an extra pocket for my tripod.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Miller

customer_reviews.title: Best case
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case would recommend it for everyone
customer_reviews.author: NFrealmu5ic4life

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It fits my spotting scope very well and it's light enough to put in my hunting pack.
customer_reviews.author: catfish

customer_reviews.title: Best value on a scope case
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price, using with a 85mm spotting scope it's a little snug but fits
customer_reviews.author: wcroft

customer_reviews.title: Great case and perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and fit. The first pack I received was missing the padded shoulder strap. But Amazon fixed that buy sending me another case. Great product and costumer service.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and keeps the spotting scope well protected
customer_reviews.author: m1henry

customer_reviews.title: pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: will cone in handy when toting the scope around i have not had the chance to use it in the field but i am sure it will be great.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: This perfect for my hunting trip to CO it straps right to my pack for longer hikes and is quick to up pack for spotting animals on the move.
customer_reviews.author: JG 916

customer_reviews.title: My only complaint is that the position of the shoulder strap doesn't allow the the unit to travel vertically like you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: This is incredible quality for the price. The side pocket is big enough to fit a small tripod. My only complaint is that the position of the shoulder strap doesn't allow the the unit to travel vertically like you'd expect. It lays flat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: for price its great, stitching is on Parr with price
customer_reviews.text: for price its great, stitching is on Parr with price. five star would require better stitching and better way to lock/mount to their packs that are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: My Swaro 65mm ATX spotting scope with angled eyepiece fit without a problem in this case. Let's see.... $300 for the crappy swaro brand skin that gives you next to zero protection on your investment or $20 for this one that gives you 20 times the protection. I looked all around for an alternative case to the garbage swaro "case" and for the price this one works very well. Is it the best? Probably not, but it is the best $20 spotting scope case I have seen so far. Works well for putting the scope inside a day pack or overnight pack while hunting.
customer_reviews.author: KTKB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scope carrying case
customer_reviews.text: Holds my 16" birding scope and the tripod straps on the side to allow me to be hands free. Love it! Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Pirnia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful scope bag one small problem
customer_reviews.text: Nice padded sleeve. Scope fits in it fine has a nice outside pocket for the tripod. There is one problem with it, the top has a strap hinge in the back and one strap and buckle in the front. The top can pivot on the two points and uncover some of top opening allowing dirt to get into the bag. I don't believe the scope would fall out. I think if there were two closers 120 degees apart in the front creating a triangle with the hinge the problem would be solved.
customer_reviews.author: tedgram

product_meta.title: ALPS OutdoorZ Stalker Spotting Scope Sleeve, Realtree Edge
product_meta.description: ALPS OutdoorZ Stalker Spotting Scope Sleeve is a great item to keep your spotting scope protected and easily accessible. The Stalker is a nice accessory that you can throw over your shoulder or clip onto your pack. With the large, padded main compartment and side pocket, there’s enough room to bring along your tri-pod and other accessories as well.
feature_bullets: Padded main compartment paired with extra thick bottom foam
Side tripod pocket and compression straps
PE frame sheet for extra protection
Our ALPS OutdoorZ Stalker is a nice accessory that you can throw over your shoulder
Dimensions: 16" long x 5" diameter, Weight: 14 oz.; Camo Pattern: Realtree Edge
